name: Nuclear Sunrise
description:
Title: 'Nuclear Sunrise'
Artist: Joshua Phillips @JPhillip_Art
'24 x 24' mixed media, acrylic and aerosol on wood panel

This NFT Raffles ticket is an entry for the potential chance of winning the original work.

A Random Number Generator will determine the winning edition number after the last ticket is purchased.

The address hodling the winning edition will receive a unique NFT which will contain unlockable content with information on how to claim the physical art. 

51% of the proceeds of the sales and royalties go towards a non profit in our network. 

To learn more, visit us at nftraffles.com
